content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'odscontainer_coviddatalakestore_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [odscontainer_coviddatalakestore_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://odscontainer@coviddatalakestore.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.factPolicies (
	[CountryName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CountryCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[Jurisdiction] nvarchar(4000),
	[Date] date,
	[C1_School_closing] int,
	[C1_Flag] int,
	[C2_Workplace_closing] int,
	[C2_Flag] int,
	[C3_Cancel_public_events] int,
	[C3_Flag] int,
	[C4_Restrictions_on_gatherings] int,
	[C4_Flag] int,
	[C5_Close_public_transport] int,
	[C5_Flag] int,
	[C6_Stay_at_home_requirements] int,
	[C6_Flag] int,
	[C7_Restrictions_on_internal_movement] int,
	[C7_Flag] int,
	[C8_International_travel_controls] int,
	[E1_Income_support] int,
	[E1_Flag] int,
	[E2_Debt_contract_relief] int,
	[E3_Fiscal_measures] int,
	[E4_International_support] int,
	[H1_Public_information_campaigns] int,
	[H1_Flag] int,
	[H2_Testing_policy] int,
	[H3_Contact_tracing] int,
	[H4_Emergency_investment_in_healthcare] int,
	[H5_Investment_in_vaccines] int,
	[H6_Facial_Coverings] int,
	[H6_Flag] int,
	[H7_Vaccination_policy] int,
	[H7_Flag] int,
	[H8_Protection_of_elderly_people] int,
	[H8_Flag] int,
	[M1_Wildcard] int,
	[StringencyIndex] int,
	[StringencyIndexForDisplay] int,
	[StringencyLegacyIndex] int,
	[StringencyLegacyIndexForDisplay] int,
	[GovernmentResponseIndex] int,
	[GovernmentResponseIndexForDisplay] int,
	[ContainmentHealthIndex] int,
	[ContainmentHealthIndexForDisplay] int,
	[EconomicSupportIndex] int,
	[EconomicSupportIndexForDisplay] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'policy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [odscontainer_coviddatalakestore_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.factPolicies
GO
